description.@en: Maybe it was my brush with death, but I feel more alive than ever. Admittedly, it’s made me a bit jittery—ignore my jimmy leg and unsteady hands; I am just so excited to see you!

system.notes: Grievous Injuries must undergo a successful Perform Surgery within twenty-four hours of suffering it, or else a character gains its related Permanent Injury.

effect.@en: You cannot Fire Through Cover, Load or Take Aim without spending an additional AP. In addition, whenever you use the Special Action of Wait, you lose 1 AP.
